step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM ZONE_FACE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[polygon]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_FACE P, ZONE_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM ZONE_LINK P, TEMP_ZONE_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM ZONE_LINK P, TEMP_ZONE_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_FACE P,TEMP_ZONE_FACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_FACE_TOPO P, TEMP_ZONE_FACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID = R.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_LINK P, TEMP_ZONE_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_LINK_KIND P, TEMP_ZONE_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_LINK_MESH P, TEMP_ZONE_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_NODE P, TEMP_ZONE_NODE R WHERE P.NODE_PID = R.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_NODE_MESH P, TEMP_ZONE_NODE R WHERE P.NODE_PID = R.PID;
DELETE FROM ZONE_FACE P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_FACE T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_FACE_TOPO P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_FACE T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_LINK_KIND P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_NODE T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_NODE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_FACE SELECT FACE_PID FROM ZONE_FACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM ZONE_FACE B WHERE A.FACE_PID = B.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM ZONE_LINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM ZONE_LINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_NODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM ZONE_NODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM ZONE_NODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);
